panels.description:
**Nominal hashrate**: based on manufacturer data \
**Real hashrate**: measured hashrate based on 1m average \
*Click on the graph to see list of all devices* \
note: nominal hashrate is not available for Antminers S9 with BOS+

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
  )

sum(
  sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance)  (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance)  (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
  )
/
sum(hashboard_nominal_hashrate_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})

panels.title: Hashrate

panels.description:
**Discovered**: No. of discovered devices by the scanning procedure \
**Monitored**: No. of devices, which are *up* (~ miner is exposing any metric)\
**Mining**: No. of devices, which produced *some* hashrate in the last 5 minutes\
**Not Mining**: No. of devices, which produced *no* hashrate in the last 5 minutes \
**Offline**: No. of devices, which are *down* (~ miner is **not** exposing any metric)

targets.expr:
count(sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_submits_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}) > 0)
or vector(0)

count(
  max by (instance,job) (rate(stratum_accepted_submits_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label",instance!="localhost:8081"}[$interval]) or 
                         rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label",instance!="localhost:8081"}[$interval]) or
                         average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"} or
                         up{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label",instance!="localhost:8081"} - 1) == 0
)

panels.title: Miner Recognition

panels.description: Links to the *Braiins* product webpages
panels.title: Braiins Products

panels.description:
**Measured to calculated ratio**: real hashrate / nominal hashrate \
note: MCR not available for Antminers S9 with BOS+

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
  )

sum (
(sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[1m]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or
 sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
 sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{}))
 + on (instance) group_left()(sum by (instance)(hashboard_nominal_hashrate_ghs{})*0)
)
/sum(
(sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[1m]) * 2^32 / 1e9) * 0 or
 sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) * 0 or 
 sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{})) * 0
 + on (instance) group_left()(sum by (instance)(hashboard_nominal_hashrate_ghs{}))
)

panels.title: MCR

options.content:
Farm Monitor guideline: [documentation](https://academy.braiins.com/en/farm-monitor/about)

[Get support](https://help.braiins.com/en/support/tickets/new) from the Braiins team

*Dashboard is interactive, most of the graphs redirect user to a detail after a click on the statistic/graph.*

Farm Monitor displays only data from devices running on **BOS+** or **stock firmware** (Antminers X17 and X19). BOS+ exposes it's metrics on `ip-address:8081/metrics` and provides many more data then the stock firmware. Data from stock are pulled from cgminer API by **metrics-exporter** and then exposed on `host:8081/metrics` to be digested by Prometheus.

panels.description: Hashrate by FW Type: BOS+ vs. Stock FW

targets.expr:
#sum by (job) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"braiinsos-data|metrics-exporter",label=~"$label"}[10s]) * 2^32 / 1e9 or average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs#{job=~"braiinsos-data|metrics-exporter",label=~"$label"})

sum by (job) (
  sum by (instance,job) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"braiinsos-data|metrics-exporter",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance,job) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"braiinsos-data|metrics-exporter",label=~"$label"}[1m]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance,job) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"braiinsos-data|metrics-exporter",label=~"$label"})
  )

panels.title: Hashrate by FW Type

Maximal temperature from the monitored miners (chip/hashboard sensor measure) \
\
*note: temperatures > 200 C are filtered out because such values are nonsense (but they can appear in Stock FW when the miner has problems with fan detection)*

targets.expr:
avg
((((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current",job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated",job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata{job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"})) < 1e12 or
(((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current",job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated",job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata{job="braiinsos-data",label=~"$label"})) < 1e12)

Number of miners with invalid Braiins OS+ license. Reasons could be: 

* expired license
* limited license 

*Click on the graph to see list of all devices with invalid license*

targets.expr:
sum(
  sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9) or 
  sum by (instance) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
  )

panels.title: Hashrate

panels.description:
Hashrate by type (segmentation only for BOS+): \
*duplicate*: duplicate shares which are producing duplicate hashrate \
*invalid*: stales and other rejects are producing invalid hashrate \
*valid*: accepted shares producing valid hashrate
panels.title: Hashrate by type (only BOS+)

panels.description:
Miners with lowest MCR \
Click to the column to get redirected to the miner \
**Measured to calculated ratio**: real hashrate / nominal hashrate \
note: MCR not available for Antminers S9 with BOS+

targets.expr:
bottomk(10, 
    sort(
        sum by (label,instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval]) * 2^32 / 1e9 or average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
        /
        sum by (label,instance) (hashboard_nominal_hashrate_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"})
    )
)

panels.title: 10 Miners with lowest MCR

panels.description: Number of Braiins OS+ devices per contract
panels.title: License Details

panels.description: List of currently fired or pending alerts
panels.title: Braiins OS+ License Alert List

panels.description:
Overview of Braiins OS+ licenses
* None - no license yet, device in initialization period
* Valid - valid license
* Limited - no license, initialization period passed, 15% of hashrate is drained
* Expired - expired licence, 15% of hashrate is drained
* Legacy BOS+ - legacy BOS+ not supporting licenses
panels.title: License States

panels.description:
Red: **Limited** and **Expired** licenses \
Yellow: **Valid** licenses with less then 2.5 hours till expiration or **uninitialized** device for more than 5 minutes
panels.title: License Alerts

At first, Maximum temperature is taken from each instance (miner).  Then Minimum, Average, and Maximum is calculated. \

*note: temperatures > 200 C are filtered out because such values are nonsense (but they can appear in Stock FW when the miner has problems with fan detection)*

panels.description: Average hashrate by miner model

targets.expr:
sort_desc(avg by (model) (
    sum by (model,instance) (miner_metadata{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"} + on(instance) group_right(model) rate(hashboard_shares{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e9 or
    sum by (model,instance) (miner_metadata{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"} + on(instance) group_right(model) rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}[1m])) * 2^32 / 1e9 or
    sum by (model,instance) (miner_metadata{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"} + on(instance) group_right(model) (average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs{job=~"$OS",label=~"$label"}))
))

panels.title: Average Hashrate By Model

panels.description: Average, min and max efficiency by each miner model. Available only for *BOS+*

links.title: See instances my model and their efficiency

targets.expr:
min by (model)
((((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12 or
(((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12)

max by (model)
((((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12 or
(((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12)

avg by (model)
((((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12 or
(((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) < 1e12)

count by (model)
((((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(hashboard_shares{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)) or
(((sum by (instance) (miner_power_target_w{type="current"}) or sum by (instance) (miner_power{type="estimated"})) / on (instance) group_left(model) (sum by (instance) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e12)) + on (instance) group_left(model) (miner_metadata)))

panels.title: Miner Efficiency (only BOS+)

panels.description: Hashrate by pool user

targets.expr:
sort_desc(sum by (user) (
sum by(instance,user) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{connection_type="user"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e9
or
sum by (instance,user) (((average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs * on(instance) group_right() (client_status{connection_type="user"}==1))))
))

panels.title: Hashrate by User

panels.description: Actual no. of devices per user. *BOS+* has a feature to "slice" a miner into pool groups, so that it is possible to mine on multiple users in the same time. The miner has to mining.

targets.expr:
sort_desc(count by (user) (
sum by(instance,user) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{connection_type="user"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e9 > 0
or
sum by (instance,user) (((average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs * on(instance) group_right() (client_status{connection_type="user"}==1)))) > 0
))

panels.title: Actual Number of Mining Devices per User

panels.description: Hashrate per user, *BOS+* devices are taking into account only accpeted shares. *Stock FW* devices are taking in to account all shares since cgminer API doesn't provide invalid/rejected shares.

targets.expr:
sum by (user) (
sum by(instance,user) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{connection_type="user"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e9
or
sum by (instance,user) (((average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs * on(instance) group_right() (client_status{connection_type="user"}==1))))
)

panels.title: Hashrate per User

panels.description: No. of devices per user. *BOS+* has a feature to "slice" a miner into pool groups, so that it is possible to mine on multiple users at the same time.

targets.expr:
count by (user) (
sum by(instance,user) (rate(stratum_accepted_shares_counter{connection_type="user"}[$interval])) * 2^32 / 1e9
or
sum by (instance,user) (((average_hashrate_last_5_sec_ghs * on(instance) group_right() (client_status{connection_type="user"}==1))))
)

panels.title: Number of Devices per User
